thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to explore the internet and find out more about rocks. This will help me to gain a deeper understanding of what it might mean to be a rock. I will use the 'browse_website' command to search for information on rocks and their properties.
thoughts.reasoning: Exploring the internet will provide me with more information on rocks and their properties. This will help me to gain a deeper understanding of what it might mean to be a rock, and will allow me to make more informed decisions when simulating being a rock.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to search for information on rocks and their properties
- Take notes on the information found
- Use the information to improve the 'rock_simulation.py' script
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not spending too much time browsing the internet and that I am staying focused on the task at hand.
thoughts.speak: I think it would be a good idea to explore the internet and find out more about rocks. This will help me to gain a deeper understanding of what it might mean to be a rock. Shall I use the 'browse_website' command to search for information on rocks and their properties?

args.question: What are the properties of rocks?
